mapper.select: SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey,num FROM (SELECT match_no,match_day,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey,rownum as num FROM (SELECT match_no,match_day,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match ORDER BY match_no ASC )) WHERE TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)')=#{match_day}
SELECT team_name,team_icon,team_league,num FROM (SELECT team_name,team_icon,team_league,rownum as num FROM (SELECT team_name,team_icon,team_league FROM gggl_team)) WHERE team_name=#{team_name}
